Class ProductionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProductionRecord
  • public class ProductionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    When a product is produced it will use a production record to insert it to the database and to the Production Log.
    Author:
    Logan Bahr

                                                    int productionCount)
